attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, British & Albanian organizations, individuals, and well wishers in the UK would like formally to express our great appreciation of Prime Minister Tony Blair, the British Government and most importantly the British people for standing up and supporting ethnic Albanians during and after the Kosova war in 1999. 
 
We ask for your full support in recognizing Kosova as an Independent and Sovereign State, in line with the will of the overwhelming majority of its people -- a state  where everyone is treated equally regardless their ethnicity, race , religion, gender or background.
